symptomAnalyzerDescription: Describe your symptoms, and our AI will suggest potential over-the-counter medicines and general advice. This tool is for informational purposes only and not a substitute for professional medical advice.
symptomsPlaceholder: e.g., I have a runny nose, sore throat, and a slight fever...
analysisResultsDescription: Based on the symptoms you provided, here are some AI-generated informational suggestions:
suggestedMedicinesInfo: The following are general suggestions. Always read product labels and consult a healthcare professional.
noMedicineSuggestionsInfo: Based on the information provided, we couldn't suggest specific over-the-counter medicines. Please consult a healthcare professional for advice.
suggestedMedicalSpecialtyInfo: For symptoms like these, or if considering these types of medications, consulting a specialist in **{specialty}** might be appropriate.
suggestedMedicalSpecialtyDisclaimer: This is an AI-generated suggestion for informational purposes only.
footerDisclaimer: This service provides AI-generated information and is not a substitute for professional medical advice. Always consult a doctor for health concerns.
validationMaxChars: Please limit your input to {count} characters.
validationLocationMinChars: Location must be at least {count} characters.
validationLocationMaxChars: Location must be at most {count} characters.
validationSpecialtyMaxChars: Specialty must be at most {count} characters.
symptomAnalysisFailed: Symptom analysis failed due to: {error}. Please try again.
errorDuringAnalysisMessage: An error occurred during symptom analysis.
noDataGenerated: AI could not generate {entity} examples for {location}{specialtyString}. Try a different query.
errorDuringSearchMessage: An error occurred while searching for {entity_plural}.
validationFailedMessage: Validation failed. Please check the fields below.
adminLoginFailed: Login failed. Please check your credentials.
symptomAnalysesDescription: AI analyses performed this week (demo data).
welcomeAdminDescription: This is your MediSeek control center.
dashboardOverviewContent: From here, you can manage blog content and view site statistics (statistics are currently placeholders). Use the sidebar to navigate.
createPostDescription: Fill in the details below to publish a new article to the MediSeek blog.
postTitlePlaceholder: Enter the title of your blog post
postContentPlaceholder: Write the full content of your blog post here...
postExcerptPlaceholder: Write a short summary or teaser for the post (max 300 characters)
deleteConfirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the post titled "{postTitle}"? This action cannot be undone.
blogPostDeletionErrorNotFound: Could not delete post. It may have already been removed or does not exist.
blogPostErrorIdMissing: Post ID is missing. Deletion failed.
noBlogPostsFoundAdminDescription: There are no blog posts to manage. Why not create one?
